content: to pin or baste the head gusset in place before seaming stuff whole body from base and seam opening fold front legs in half lengthwise and stitch edges together gathering the seam slightly to shape the leg stuff and sew to body cut canvas in pieces which are slightly smaller than the ears ironing the raw edges under sew to ears then stitch to body eyes nose and whiskers can be made with anything you like or even embroidered on i like the look of straw from an old broom for the whiskers tail this can also be made with anything you like even a cotton ball i made a pom pom for my rabbit s tail using this method http //www helloknitty com/pdfs/pompom pdf and used hot-glue to attach it don t worry if your rabbit ends up looking different than mine various seaming and stuffing methods can create a wide variety of looks rabbits in the wild don t all look the same after all
